changeSet.sql:
WITH tp AS (SELECT exercise.id, exercise.template_participation_id FROM exercise WHERE exercise.discriminator = 'P' AND exercise.template_participation_id IS NOT NULL) , sp AS (SELECT exercise.id, exercise.solution_participation_id FROM exercise WHERE exercise.discriminator = 'P' AND exercise.solution_participation_id IS NOT NULL)
, fe AS (SELECT feedback.id, feedback.text, exercise.id AS exercise_id FROM feedback LEFT JOIN result ON feedback.result_id = r.id LEFT JOIN participation ON result.participation_id = p.id , exercise WHERE feedback.type = 3 AND feedback.text IS NOT NULL AND feedback.reference IS NULL AND feedback.text NOT LIKE 'SubPolFeedbackIdentifier%' AND (participation.exercise_id = e.id OR participation.id = (SELECT tp.template_participation_id FROM tp WHERE tp.id = e.id) OR participation.id = (SELECT sp.solution_participation_id FROM sp WHERE sp.id = e.id)))
UPDATE feedback
SET feedback.test_case_id = (SELECT tc.id FROM programming_exercise_test_case tc, fe WHERE tc.test_name = fe.text AND tc.exercise_id = fe.exercise_id AND fe.id = f.id) WHERE feedback.type = 3 AND feedback.text IS NOT NULL AND feedback.text NOT LIKE 'SubPolFeedbackIdentifier%' AND feedback.reference IS NULL
UPDATE feedback SET text = NULL WHERE test_case_id IS NOT NULL
